creator: m.watts@eris.qinetiq.com
text:
The output of such commands as "httpd -M" appears not to be sent to stdout but
to stderr instead.
This means you have to do:

httpd -M 2>&1 | grep shared

In order to grep for the "shared" string

creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 42571 ***
